changeTolerance(double) - Method in class controller.GestureController
Modifies Epsilon by e, a positive e will make position detection less sensitive and a negative e will make detection more sensitive.

chkCoord(int, int, int) - Method in class controller.GestureController
Checks if val is between cur and prev, the bounds do not need to be in any order thus if prev > cur, cur > prev, or cur = prev this will still return the proper value
